name: Bardcore
description:
Play as a fellow Bardian in this bullet hell adventure! Use WASD to move around and left mouse button to shoot. Press spacebar to use your Bard Blast. The Bard needs help searching for her Lute, Flute, and Music Sheet that have been taken from her to stop her from performing. She will face the wraith of fruit being hurled her way but nothing will stop her from performing in the Tavern of her dreams!

This game was created with only 49 events in the free version of Construct 3!

Music: Gabriel Gallegos

Art and programming: Lauren Nakamura
